name: Little Pig Go Home:Run Adventure World
name_original: Little Pig Go Home:Run Adventure World
description:
The pig have some troubles in the adventure, please help her return to home now!
But she is very hungry,collect all the food for her and
find your way to the exit as fast as possible.
Jump to avoid other pigs.Easy to control!and you can break special rocks by your pan!
great adventure game, waiting for your challenge!Much fun!
